website_summaries.verdict: The D7200 is the most serious D-SLR in Nikon's DX lineup, but it doesn't equal our Editors' Choice Canon 7D Mark II for capturing action.
pros: Sensor design omits optical low-pass filter
Very strong high ISO image quality
cons: 6fps burst rate is slowest in class
Tops out at 5fps with limited buffer when shooting in Raw

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D7200
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera. Having 2 SD card slots is brilliant and it will last me a very long time. Came with the 105mm kit lens which is pretty good. Well made camera as is normal for Nikon. Got a free extra battery with it as well so very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DxB

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money
customer_reviews.text: By far the best crop sensor value for money. If i had more money to spend i would love to have a d500 but unfortunately i got this whilst on sale. Best camera i have ever used and fits all my old lens
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Seemed a better bet than the more recent Nikkon versions
customer_reviews.text: Personal replacement for an office one. Seemed a better bet than the more recent Nikkon versions, and I like the dual card slot. I use the viewfinder for better photography, and for stills I don't need a swivel screen. For rugged outdoor use, fewer sticking out bits are better. Very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: An upgrade from my beloved D40 and I love it. Not so different that I can’t work out how to use it but it has so much more to it and the WiFi works really well so I can add filters and upload to social media. Very happy and would recommend if you are also considering an upgrade from an older model.
customer_reviews.author: Finoula

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Upgraded from a D90 which was a great camera, the D7200 is excellent quality camera, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with camera.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome upgrade to my d7000. Image quality brilliant and everything else very familiar. Impressive focus. Much more reliable than d7000.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera I read all the reviews on it and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera I read all the reviews on it and they all said the same great camera. It arrived in the time stated .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not someone who is great technically and these are simple and easy to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not someone who is great technically and these are simple and easy to use which is what I need. The photos are great as you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Abel

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D7200
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome camera. Built in WIFI a huge bonus . Completely different level to my old D3200
customer_reviews.author: M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with purchase / excellent price and item exactly as ...
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with purchase / excellent price and item exactly as described / did come with euro plugs but not a problem as uses exactly the same battery and charger as my previous D7000 / would recommend
customer_reviews.author: p davis

customer_reviews.title: This is the top of amateur range and it shows ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the top of amateur range and it shows, many improvements on my older D90. higher ISO,resolution and all the rest. If you have the money to spend then the D7200 is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: merlin

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from the D3000/5000 series
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade from the D3000/5000 series. Good next level enthusiast camera. Enjoying learning the additional options and controls.
customer_reviews.author: AdeA

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Superb camera, absolutely love it. It may seem a bit expensive for an enthusiast camera but it's definitely worth it. When I bought mine Nikon were giving away a free battery grip....what's not to love!
customer_reviews.author: G. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Nikon is my go to camera
customer_reviews.text: I’m really pleased with this camera, it’s quite technical, but I’m coming to grips with it. I’ve taken some fantastic shots with it. I’ve added on I took of a ladybird.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Cook

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight but well built
customer_reviews.text: Does the job brilliantly, easy to learn battery life is brilliant coming from a Sony a6000.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying.....HELL YES!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from D3200 to this model, still easy to use, packed full of great features and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, brilliant hand held night shots (see pics attached), use with 18 -300mm & Tam 150 - 600mm
customer_reviews.author: FireSnapper

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did
customer_reviews.text: My grand son took over my D3200 and I treated myself to the D7200. So glad I did. there response from this camera is far better than the D3200. It's easier to use and control. On reflection I have no idea why I never went for this model first. At least it has given my grand son an entry level camera to start on.
customer_reviews.author: P.M.Adley.

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just loving this camera. Shooting RAW (NEF) all the time and my photography, which wasn't great, has taken a turn for the better. The higher resolution allows me to crop like never before allowing me to do things I just didn't have the data to do before. The camera is very robust and the free grip offer is a bonus if you, like me, like continuous shooting. Excellent camera!
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb package. (I purchased the kit with the 18 to 105 mm telephoto) The camera has a vast array of functions and the lense is as sharp as a button. I have used it to take photos of my local country park and taken it with me on visits to RSPB reserves and National Trust properties. It was at my limit for the amount I could justify spending on a camera body with a 'standard' lense but the features and overall quality have made me very happy with my decision. If you are an 'enthusiast' rather than a semi professional then give it a look.
customer_reviews.author: David Verney

customer_reviews.title: Best Nikon Camera...so far
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a camera! This camera has so many features that it would take hours to tell you about them. (I like the WiFi) I have had many Nikon cameras over the years but this one has just blown me away, I have it 2 weeks and I'm discovering new features every day, its amazing what it can do. I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old D90 with this and it is streets ahead. It's not just an improvement in resolution, the pictures are brighter, more vivid and the focus is quicker. Love the scenes and effects modes and the ability to have JPGs saved to one SD card and RAW (NEF) to the other. 2 custom user settings will come in very usefull too. The wifi and NFC is a useful addition that I will definitely use when I'm away, but the app is just a bit to clunky for me to use it always as part of my digital workflow.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mawer

customer_reviews.title: It will take me a while to master it but I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My new camera - outstanding in every way. I was surprised to see it's got a lot more features than my old D7000.. It will take me a while to master it but I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: It has all been said before really. This camera is fantastic. I upgraded from a Nikon D90 and I am delighted with my new purchase. Very swift delivery as well. Ordered Sunday afternoon, arrived Tuesday morning (via the Pass the Parcel system). Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good all round DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Good all round DSLR. A reasonable choice for sports and wildlife. Very good focusing system, which does take a little bit of effort to use properly.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W

customer_reviews.title: Snaps to Photography
customer_reviews.text: Cracking camera great build quality i just need to improve my photography to match camera . Ergonomics are very good rht handed "I am Nikon"
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is everything I hoped it would be. If I don’t get better results with this camera it will not be the camera’s fault.
customer_reviews.author: resonator444

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality! Great for all enthusiast's and budding photographers! Easy to work if you are already familiar with DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy V Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present and they are really pleased with it, takes fantastic pictures.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't stop using it !! Met all my expectations !!@
customer_reviews.author: Hector Daniel Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Best seller
customer_reviews.text: One of the best DSLR! Delivery was very fast and will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kurutharan Thangavadivel

customer_reviews.title: A good upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a d80 to the d7200 and wow what a fantastic camera
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to the family
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected, superb quality and handling. WiFi and HD Movie great additions. Coupled with the Nikon 18-300--6.3 lens the whole kit feels very professional at amateur prices. The lens can feel a little in the way of the right hand grip, but this is only particular to this lens. First results are exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Bob the Gas

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, don't buy as upgrade from 7000 or 7100
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera if upgrading from an entry camera such as d3300 etc. But save yourself some money by buying 7000 or 7001. If you go on utube for instruction same applies to all three cameras. Couple of tweets but not to justify extra money. Nikon make great cameras and this is one of them but no better than its predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P G Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I already have a Nikon D7000 and was looking for a second body in the same product range. There is lots written about this product on Amazon so I'm not going to repeat what's been said. The camera has loads of features and I particularly like the built-in wifi. A very useful addition. Definitely *****
customer_reviews.author: MikeTango

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera and equally wonderful lens it came with. I'm a total novice to DSLR and it's my first, so took me a while to get the hang of it as there are so many options and buttons. Got it end of December but finally started to have some good photos.
customer_reviews.author: Jabeen

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is fantastic however the one i received from amazon had been opened and contained no literature I wasn't convinced it wasn't a returnew item so it promptly went back. I later bought from a camera shop and can honestly say this camera is absolutely fantastic it has helped take my photography to another level
customer_reviews.author: jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great, great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great, great camera. Fromt he brilliant D90 we went to the poorish D7000. Then the D7100 improved things. But ht e D7200 is right back at the top of the class. ALthough now I want/need the faster FPS of the D500 for the sports shots but not before the rpice cools down (a lot)
customer_reviews.author: ccnp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product as one would expect from Nikon, extra bracketing range is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Hryzko

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant camera, upgraded from a Nikon D5100 and honestly couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Connor Byers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera - Professional Results
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. I upgraded from a Nikon D3200 and it was worth every penny. I have had this item for a few months now and already learnt so much about it. I have used this camera for video and photo and in my opinion it excels in both. I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone, whether you're just a beginner or an enthusiast. If you are thinking of buying this camera, make sure you check out reviews and tutorials as they really helped me decide whether I wanted it or should be looking for something else. I will attach a few pictures of some of the pictures I have captured on this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I had the Nikon D90, which is a really good camera but I'm really happy with the Nikon D7200. Great quality images and I love that I can pair it with my phone :)
customer_reviews.author: Ana Cristina Newell

customer_reviews.title: The camera has arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: There is a spot on the sensor so all the photos i have taken today - the first time i have used it - are coming up with a large spot on them. we have tested it with other lenses and it's the camera not the lens. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensor Dust Problems
customer_reviews.text: Major sensor dust issues with this camera. I have had 2 from Jessops and 1 from amazon, on each of them, after taking them out and photographing under 50 shots i had 5-10 spots of sensor dust (having not even changed the lens on the last two units) Its a real shame as this cameras image quality is fantastic. But i have had to switch to canon as i have lost faith in this brand. Amazon themselves have been fantastic as usual with arranging my return but very disappointed that such a fantastic camera seems crippled with such a fundamental (and expensive to resolve) flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nikon D7200 Digital SLR Camera Body and Wireless Mobile Adapter
feature_bullets: Capture images with wide dynamic range, low noise and rich colour gradation made possible with the 24.4 MP DX-format sensor
Nikon's EXPEED 4 processor boosts the camera's overall performance

Easy Transfer: Images from selected Nikon COOLPIX and Nikon D-SLR models can be downloaded to a compatible smart device as they are taken, or existing images can be downloaded from the camera's SD memory

Easy Sharing: Single images or groups of images can be shared using apps stored on the smart device via email, text messaging or by uploading to a blog or social networking sitejust like any other image on your smartphone or tablet.
